headline: BD to Initiate Real-World Patient Data Registry for the Rotarex™ Atherectomy System in Treatment of Peripheral Artery Disease
summary: BD (Becton, Dickinson and Company) (NYSE: BDX), a leading global medical technology company, today announced plans to initiate a patient data registry for the Rotarex™ Atherectomy System to measure real-world outcomes for patients with peripheral artery disease (PAD).
